import React,{useState} from "react"; import AccInput from "./AccInput"; function Account() { const[img,newim]=useState("my_img/profile_db.webp") function uplodeimg(e) { const file = e.target.files[0]; const reader = new FileReader(); reader.onload = () => { newim(reader.result); }; if (file) { reader.readAsDataURL(file); } } return( <>
user-profile
< button className="btn btn-primary btn-sm" title="Upload new profile image" onClick={() => { document.getElementById('fileinput').click(); return false; }}>

) } export default Account;
